allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Implement interactive Hugging Face fine-tuning plugin

- Added full fine-tuning workflow with real-time terminal updates
- Implemented model/dataset validation and search on HF Hub
- Created preprocessing script for data cleaning and golden subset creation
- Developed QLoRA training script with TQDM progress bars
- Added finetune-expert agent for ML optimization

Co-Authored-By: loaiabdalslam <loaiabdalslam@Gmail.com>
Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(finetune\): Robust training script and hub validation fixes

- Switched to SFTConfig for better TRL 0.27.2 compatibility
- Implemented dynamic target module detection for LoRA
- Added CPU/CUDA auto-detection for optimizer and precision
- Fixed dataset loading for local disk-saved datasets
- Resolved Unicode encoding issues in hub search results
- Disabled TensorBoard to avoid environment-specific crashes

Co-Authored-By: loaiabdalslam <loaiabdalslam@Gmail.com>
Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
